args.content:
import Mathlib
open Complex

/-- Suppose a 2×2 real matrix M is represented by z ↦ ξ z + ζ conj z (identifying ℂ ≃ ℝ^2 via the basis (1, I)).
    Then det M = |ξ|^2 - |ζ|^2. -/
theorem jirilebl_ca_ca_1146 (ξ ζ : ℂ) :
  let a := ξ.re; b := ξ.im; c := ζ.re; d := ζ.im
  let M : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) ℝ := fun (i j : Fin 2) =>
    if i = 0 then if j = 0 then a + c else -b + d
    else if j = 0 then b + d else a - c
  M.det = Complex.normSq ξ - Complex.normSq ζ := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib
open Complex

/-- Suppose a 2×2 real matrix M is represented by z ↦ ξ z + ζ conj z (identifying ℂ ≃ ℝ^2 via the basis (1, I)).
    Then det M = |ξ|^2 - |ζ|^2. -/
theorem jirilebl_ca_ca_1146 (ξ ζ : ℂ) :
  let a := ξ.re
  let b := ξ.im
  let c := ζ.re
  let d := ζ.im
  let M : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) ℝ := fun (i j : Fin 2) =>
    match i, j with
    | 0, 0 => a + c
    | 0, 1 => -b + d
    | 1, 0 => b + d
    | 1, 1 => a - c
    end
  in M.det = Complex.normSq ξ - Complex.normSq ζ := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib
open Complex

/-- Suppose a 2×2 real matrix M is represented by z ↦ ξ z + ζ conj z (identifying ℂ ≃ ℝ^2 via the basis (1, I)).
    Then det M = |ξ|^2 - |ζ|^2. -/
theorem jirilebl_ca_ca_1146 (ξ ζ : ℂ) :
  let a : ℝ := (ξ + ζ).re in
  let b : ℝ := (ξ + ζ).im in
  let c : ℝ := - (ξ - ζ).im in
  let d : ℝ := (ξ - ζ).re in
  let M : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) ℝ := fun i j => if i = 0 then if j = 0 then a else c else if j = 0 then b else d in
  M.det = Complex.normSq ξ - Complex.normSq ζ := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib
open Complex

/-- Suppose a 2×2 real matrix M is represented by z ↦ ξ z + ζ conj z (identifying ℂ ≃ ℝ^2 via the basis (1, I)).
    Then det M = |ξ|^2 - |ζ|^2. -/
theorem jirilebl_ca_ca_1146 (ξ ζ : ℂ) :
  let a : ℝ := ξ.re + ζ.re
  let b : ℝ := -ξ.im + ζ.im
  let c : ℝ := ξ.im + ζ.im
  let d : ℝ := ξ.re - ζ.re
  let M : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) ℝ := fun i j =>
    match i, j with
    | (0 : Fin 2), (0 : Fin 2) => a
    | (0 : Fin 2), (1 : Fin 2) => b
    | (1 : Fin 2), (0 : Fin 2) => c
    | (1 : Fin 2), (1 : Fin 2) => d
  in M.det = Complex.normSq ξ - Complex.normSq ζ := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib
open Complex

/-- Suppose a 2×2 real matrix M is represented by z ↦ ξ z + ζ conj z (identifying ℂ ≃ ℝ^2 via the basis (1, I)).
    Then det M = |ξ|^2 - |ζ|^2. -/
theorem jirilebl_ca_ca_1146 (ξ ζ : ℂ) :
  let a : ℝ := ξ.re + ζ.re
  let b : ℝ := -ξ.im + ζ.im
  let c : ℝ := ξ.im + ζ.im
  let d : ℝ := ξ.re - ζ.re
  let M : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) ℝ := Matrix.of fun i j =>
    if i = 0 then if j = 0 then a else b else if j = 0 then c else d
  M.det = Complex.normSq ξ - Complex.normSq ζ := by sorry
